alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Hand; Hughes; Hyde; Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued November 01 at 1:48AM MDT until November 01 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND BREEZY WINDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY AND BREEZY WINDS... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Red Flag Warning for low humidity and breezy winds, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM CDT Wednesday. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Stanley, Hughes, Hyde, Hand, Jones, Lyman and Buffalo. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph for both this afternoon and Wednesday afternoon. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent both this afternoon and Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The combination of breezy winds, low humidity, and cured fine fuels will result in critical fire weather conditions over portions of central and south central South Dakota.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Buffalo; Hand; Hughes; Hyde; Jones; Lyman; Stanley
